name: Inception
description: Inception is a mind-bending science fiction film directed by Christopher Nolan.

name: The Dark Knight
description: The Dark Knight is a gritty superhero film directed by Christopher Nolan.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: Pulp Fiction is a stylish crime film directed by Quentin Tarantino.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: The Shawshank Redemption is a powerful drama about hope and friendship in the face of adversity.

name: Forrest Gump
description: Forrest Gump is a heartwarming drama that follows the life of a kind-hearted man with remarkable experiences.

name: The Matrix
description: The Matrix is a groundbreaking science fiction film that explores the nature of reality and freedom.

name: Titanic
description: Titanic is a romantic disaster film that depicts the tragic sinking of the RMS Titanic.

name: Gladiator
description: Gladiator is an epic historical drama that follows the story of a Roman general seeking revenge.

name: Avatar
description: Avatar is a visually stunning science fiction film set on the alien world of Pandora.

name: The Godfather
description: The Godfather is a classic crime film that follows the rise of the Corleone crime family.

name: Interstellar
description: Interstellar is an ambitious science fiction film that explores space travel and the survival of humanity.

name: Inglourious Basterds
description: Inglourious Basterds is a World War II film with a unique and stylized approach to storytelling.

name: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: The Wolf of Wall Street is a biographical film based on the true story of Jordan Belfort.

name: The Green Mile
description: The Green Mile is a powerful drama set on death row, exploring themes of humanity and redemption.

name: Django Unchained
description: Django Unchained is a violent and entertaining Western film directed by Quentin Tarantino.

name: Fight Club
description: Fight Club is a dark and edgy drama that explores themes of consumerism and societal rebellion.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: The Fellowship of the Ring is the first installment in the epic fantasy trilogy based on J.R.R. Tolkien's novels.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
description: The Silence of the Lambs is a chilling psychological thriller that features iconic performances.

name: Goodfellas
description: Goodfellas is a gripping crime drama based on the true story of a mobster's rise and fall.

name: The Revenant
description: The Revenant is a brutal survival drama set in the American wilderness.

name: Saving Private Ryan
description: Saving Private Ryan is an intense war film that follows a group of soldiers on a mission to save a paratrooper.

name: Se7en
description: Se7en is a dark and atmospheric crime thriller centered around a series of gruesome murders.

name: The Intouchables
description: The Intouchables is a heartwarming French film based on the true story of an unlikely friendship between a quadriplegic aristocrat and his caregiver.

name: The Pursuit of Happyness
description: The Pursuit of Happyness is an inspiring biographical drama about overcoming obstacles to achieve success and happiness.

name: Schindler's List
description: Schindler's List is a powerful historical drama based on the true story of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who saved Jews during the Holocaust.

name: The Pianist
description: The Pianist is a poignant biographical film that tells the story of a Jewish pianist's struggle for survival during the Holocaust.

name: Whiplash
description: Whiplash is an intense drama about the abusive relationship between a talented drummer and his demanding instructor.

name: The Usual Suspects
description: The Usual Suspects is a gripping crime thriller known for its clever plot twists and memorable characters.

name: American History X
description: American History X is a thought-provoking drama that explores the roots of hate and the possibility of redemption.

name: The Lion King
description: The Lion King is a beloved animated film that tells the coming-of-age story of Simba, a young lion prince.

name: The Sixth Sense
description: The Sixth Sense is a supernatural thriller known for its twist ending and eerie atmosphere.

name: Braveheart
description: Braveheart is an epic historical drama based on the life of Scottish warrior William Wallace.

name: Life Is Beautiful
description: Life Is Beautiful is a touching comedy-drama set during World War II, highlighting the power of imagination and love.

name: A Beautiful Mind
description: A Beautiful Mind is a biographical drama about the mathematician John Nash and his struggle with mental illness.

name: Jurassic Park
description: Jurassic Park is a groundbreaking science fiction adventure film about a theme park populated by genetically engineered dinosaurs.

name: Gone with the Wind
description: Gone with the Wind is a classic romance film set against the backdrop of the American Civil War.

name: The Shining
description: The Shining is a psychological horror film based on Stephen King's novel, featuring an eerie hotel and a descent into madness.

name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: The Grand Budapest Hotel is a quirky comedy film set in a fictional European hotel between the wars.

name: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
description: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly is a classic spaghetti Western known for its iconic characters and epic showdowns.

name: City of God
description: City of God is a Brazilian crime drama that depicts life in the favelas of Rio de Janeiro.

name: The Bridge on the River Kwai
description: The Bridge on the River Kwai is a World War II drama set in a Japanese prisoner-of-war camp.

name: Reservoir Dogs
description: Reservoir Dogs is a stylish crime film that explores the aftermath of a botched diamond heist.

name: The Great Gatsby
description: The Great Gatsby is a visually stunning drama based on F. Scott Fitzgerald's classic novel of the Roaring Twenties.

name: The Terminator
description: The Terminator is a groundbreaking science fiction film about a cyborg assassin sent back in time.

name: The Exorcist
description: The Exorcist is a classic horror film that follows the demonic possession of a young girl and the attempts to save her.

name: Amélie
description: Amélie is a charming French romantic comedy about a whimsical young woman in Paris.

name: Scarface
description: Scarface is a gritty crime drama that tells the rise and fall of a Cuban immigrant turned drug lord in Miami.

name: The Prestige
description: The Prestige is a captivating drama centered around rival magicians in London during the 19th century.

name: Finding Nemo
description: Finding Nemo is a heartwarming animated adventure about a clownfish searching for his lost son in the ocean.

name: Drive
description: Drive is a stylish crime thriller that follows a Hollywood stunt driver who moonlights as a getaway driver.

name: The Big Lebowski
description: The Big Lebowski is a cult classic comedy about an easygoing slacker who gets caught up in a bizarre kidnapping case.

name: In Bruges
description: In Bruges is a darkly comedic crime film that follows two hitmen hiding out in the picturesque city of Bruges, Belgium.

name: The Social Network
description: The Social Network is a biographical drama about the founding of Facebook and the conflicts that arise among its creators.

name: Dallas Buyers Club
description: Dallas Buyers Club is a biographical drama based on the true story of Ron Woodroof, who fought to make AIDS medication accessible.
